FuncDef: This command applies one or more (up to five) route polices as IS-IS import policies.

ParaDef.Info: Identify the export route policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long, composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes. The specified name(s) must already be defined.
